title: Microsoft Teams: Call delegation feature enhancements
description:
Shared line appearance lets a user choose a
delegate to answer or handle calls on their behalf. We are launching a
simplified experience for users who have set up call delegation which will be
available on the Teams desktop app and Teams phone devices. The new UI will
allow delegates to easily switch between the different delegator lines they
manage and view call history for the delegatorâ€™s line.
Delegators will be able to view and join active calls handled by the delegate
and grant delegates permission to join active calls.
